name: Format\TableCellSelector
description: The object for defining conditions that will cause a conditional style to be applied to a cell.

properties.name: columnIndex
properties.description: Specifies a column index. The leftmost column of data has an index of .

properties.name: descriptor
properties.description: Specifies the identifier of a specific data descriptor. All cells for this data descriptor will be selected. See .

properties.name: evenColumns
properties.description: When true, selects the cells in even columns.

properties.name: evenRows
properties.description: When true, selects the cells in even rows.

properties.name: oddColumns
properties.description: When true, selects the cells in odd columns.

properties.name: oddRows
properties.description: When true, selects the cells in odd rows.

properties.name: rowIndex
properties.description: Specifies a row index. The topmost row of data has an index of .
